𒆳 ≈ 𒀸𒋰 ≈ 𓈉 𒆳 KUR Ort 𒆴 ⇔ CIR3 𓊖 country > sár™
𒆳 KUR "court" 𒆳 KUR "course" 𒀸 𒆳 𒈬𒅆 ina šat ⁿmuǧi "in the course of the night" 𒆳 KUR KAR GUR₁₆ ጋራ gara გორა góra ಗಿರಿ кайа کۄہ הַר 𒆴 𒆳*𒆳 kur-kur-ra = mountains; lands [ ~ + 𒊏 RA aux.] 𒆳 kurᵒⁿ crown 𓈉 gin₃ 𒆳 kur ≈ cry in 𒄑𒆳 ᵍiz-kur Geschrei 𒆳 kur ≈ cry in cricket 𒆳 #zizanu 𒍩 𒆳 kur PIE gʷʰer charm warm "burn" 𒆳𒂦 kur-bad₃ kurbad κορυφή koruphḗᵗ copete 𓁶 "mountain top"

𒆳 kuršat 𓐍 𓆼 𓋴 𓏏 𓈉 "coast" ( 𒆳𒌓𒋾 kurˢtam-ti )

𒆳 ≈ 𒐼 in 𒆳 sad 𓈋 saddle 𒆳𒌑 "mountain" 𒐼𒁲 ŠA-DI 𒆳 šat 𓊨 𓏏 𓊖 Statt šad 𓈉 #ḫst خطه xatte خِطَّة ḵiṭṭa "mount"
𒆳 šat satrap state ⇔ 𓊨 𓏏 𓊖 seat …

𒆳 šat side in 𒀸 𒆳 𒀀𒄭𒂗𒈾𒀀 (on the opposite side) 𒆳 šat "that" article!

𒆳 mat < 𒈠𒁕 ma-da mada •matria 𓈉 𓊖 land, country; earth, land "mother" mud 𒆳 mat < mont < mount 𓈉 𓊖 medina 𒆳𒈬𒀫 Mu-ZUR Mizraim
𒆳 mat < mont < mount > moun™ 𒄠𒉌 am-ni mountain, hill 𒆳 @ 𒄠
